data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 176 believers in the state of Faryab to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Faryab, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Faryab, Afghanistan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6302 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 176 believers in the state of Faryab into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Faryab, Afghanistan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turkmen people might believe through him.
Spirit, help the 176 believers in Faryab to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Faryab.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Faryab who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Faryab
location.cities_list: Maymana, Andkhōy, Qal‘ah-ye Shahr, Dowlatābād, Bal Chirāgh
location.cities_list_w_pop: Maymana (75,900), Andkhōy (29,208), Qal‘ah-ye Shahr (7,756), Dowlatābād, Bal Chirāgh
